items.sentence: Tom didn\'t seem to understand what was going on.
Tom didn\'t want to go back to where he was born.
Tom doesn\'t have to go there unless he wants to.
Who do you think is better at French, you or Tom?
Who do you think was more surprised, Tom or Mary?
You have to ask for permission from your teacher.
The people in the other room are speaking French.
The person I look forward to working with is Tom.
The police have one of the kidnappers in custody.
The police never caught the guy who attacked Tom.
Tom complained that he had been unfairly treated.
Tom convinced Mary to buy him an expensive watch.
Tom could hear birds chirping outside his window.
Tom could never do what you are asking him to do.
They promised Tom that he\'d be paid $30 an hour.
I know I shouldn\'t have expected Tom to do that.
I know I\'m not the only one who thinks this way.
I know Mary is pretty, but she\'s not very smart.
My father was about to leave when the phone rang.
She herself helped him because no one else would.
